arts.ttl: Wrexham drop first home game as rally falls short
arts.sum: Wrexham lost ground in the promotion race after a 3-2 home defeat to Stevenage in England's third division on Tuesday.

arts.ttl: Stevenage claim a deserved 3-2 win at Wrexham in League One
arts.sum: Goals by Dan Kemp and Jamie Reid had stunned the home crowd and even though they pulled one back, Paul Mullin getting the credit, Jake Young restored the two-goal lead with 19 minutes to go. Stevenage: Cooper, Piergianni, Sweeney (Goode 82), Appere (Young 64), Kemp, Roberts (List 64), Smith (Freeman 60) Freestone, Reid, Phillips, King (Thompson 82).

arts.ttl: Wrexham comeback falls short in 3-2 loss. Tom Brady applauds Birmingham's win
arts.sum: Wrexham lost ground in the promotion race after a 3-2 home defeat to Stevenage in England’s third division on Tuesday. Wrexham hadn’t lost a League One home game all season.

arts.ttl: Wrexham suffer shock home defeat to lose ground in promotion race
arts.sum: A trio of Stevenage goalscorers secured a 3-2 away win over Wrexham to end the Red Dragons' 22-home game unbeaten run.

arts.ttl: Stevenage trio secure shock victory to end Wrexham unbeaten run at home
Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney sent warning as Wrexham tipped to 'spend aggressively'
arts.sum: Wrexham have moved up the EFL ladder quickly thanks to the investment of Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney, but they have been warned they will need to spend big in the Championship

arts.ttl: We're don't fear Wrexham trip - Stevenage's Dan Kemp
arts.sum: "We need to take ownership, a lot of more ownership in games, [and by that, I mean] scoring goals, or making that extra aggressive pass or putting the ball in the area as we did [for the goal]. "We went to Barnsley against a really good side and produced a great performance so it should give us more belief, even though we don’t need it.

arts.ttl: Rob McElhenney gets reality check over Wrexham stadium plans after Ryan Reynolds warning
arts.sum: Wrexham co-owner Rob McElhenney has been forced to drastically reduce his ambitious plans to increase the club's stadium capacity - and it's a reality check that Ryan Reynolds predicted

arts.ttl: Ryan Reynolds hits nail on head as Rob McElhenney gets Wrexham stadium reality check
arts.sum: Rob McElhenney wanted to increase the capacity of Wrexham's Racecourse Ground to as much as 55,000, but a more realistic figure has been named after Ryan Reynolds' scepticism

arts.ttl: Reading reject Stevenage bid for young midfielder
arts.sum: Reading have rejected a bid from fellow League One side Stevenage for Michael Craig, as per Pete O’Rourke.… The post Reading reject Stevenage bid for young midfielder appeared first on The72 - Football League News.
